data: AMB Ferric Derisomaltose (Iron Isomaltoside) (Day of Treatment)

Restricted to:    1. Indications outlined by BC Renal AND patients who are registered with BC Renal    OR    1. Intolerance or poor response to oral iron supplements or gastrointestinal malabsorption syndrome (for example, inflammatory bowel disease, active Celiac disease, atrophic gastritis)     AND    a. Hemoglobin less than 110 g/L AND ONE OF     *ferritin less than 30 mcg/L OR      *ferritin less than 200 mcg/L with iron saturation less than 20%     AND     b. Total dose required exceeds 300 mg IV iron elemental
Max single dose: 20 mg/kg or 1000 mg, whichever is less
1,000 mg, IV, once, drug form: inj
500 mg, IV, once, drug form: inj
Select or modify the medications within Hypersensitivity / Anaphylaxis Module as required
